title: Did The New York Times Report in 1924 That Hitler Was ‘Tamed by Prison’?
subtitle: Critics of Donald Trump warned of historical parallels between the U.S. Capitol attack of 2021, and the Munich Putsch of 1923.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 1924, the New York Times reported that Adolf Hitler's short term of imprisonment had left him "tamed" and "no longer to be feared."
